title: Media freedom decreased from Yeltsin to Putin

content.question: One major contrast between the Yeltsin and Putin presidential administrations in terms of domestic policies lies in the

choices.label: extensive media freedom under Yeltsin and the significant decrease in media freedom under Putin
peaceful relations with Chechnya under Yeltsin and the violent relations with Chechnya under Putin
strong government control over political parties under Yeltsin and freer, multiparty competition under Putin
limited use of presidential decrees under Yeltsin and the extensive use of presidential decrees under Putin
continuation of the centrally planned economy under Yeltsin and the quickÂ move to a free-market economy under Putin

content.answer: extensive media freedom under Yeltsin and the significant decrease in media freedom under Putin

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
